content.raw:
This looks good to me. But since we're going to bridge this message to ROS, how about we add a couple of fields that are already available in [LinearBatteryPlugin](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/0c60411df5f6b4a0c9b6f7fb9ea3b91e7f068f5b/src/systems/battery_plugin/LinearBatteryPlugin.cc#lines-66)?

See [sensor_msgs/BatteryState](http://docs.ros.org/melodic/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/BatteryState.html).

I suggest we add:

* `voltage`
* `current`
* `charge`
* `capacity`
* `power_supply_status` (which for now will always be `PowerSupplyStatus::DISCHARGING`, but we may be soon adding charging capabilities and it would be good not to have to add a new message.

And change:

* `BatterySoC` to `BatteryState`  
* `battery_soc.proto` to `battery_state.proto`

Let me know what you think!
